overview: A simple unemployed foreign guy living in Belarus is in trouble, he owes money to people 10,000 in value and has 1 week to return back this amount or else he meets his death . While walking in the forest lost and thinking where to get the money, suddenly finds Tanya. A rich girl who escaped from her father because she wants to be married in Madagascar, but her father wants her wedding in Minsk.
title: I'd prefer your problems princess
